ygData.subject: (OT) The Day the Earth Stood Still (was: Bards questing)
ygData.msgSnippet: Nah - see the above title.  It s really really Off Topic, but hey ;) Speaking of Off-Topic, I ve been thinking of compiling little bits like that.  Hidden
ygData.messageBody:
Nah - see the above title. It's really really Off Topic, but hey ;)

Speaking of Off-Topic, I've been thinking of compiling little "bits" like
that. Hidden "cute" things, almost Easter eggs, but not quite...
Things like, have you ever translated the side of the Qeynos
clocktower?* Or notice the fisherman named "Bait Masterson"?
Other little things like that.

Talies

*(Answer coming later if no one else posts it)
